remarks: The natural bijection from ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` to an arbitrary nontrivial closed interval ` [ A , B ] ` is a homeomorphism.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2015.)
statement:
icchmeo.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
icchmeo.f $e |- F = ( x e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) |-> ( ( x x. B ) + ( ( 1 - x ) x. A ) ) ) $.
icchmeo $p |- ( ( A e. RR /\ B e. RR /\ A < B ) -> F e. ( II Homeo ( J |`t ( A [,] B ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d J x $.
